mapper.sql: t.id, t.ordertype, t.ordermoney, t.createtime, t.paytime, t.invalidtime, t.transactionid, t.prepayId, t.status, t.wxid, t.addressid, t.itemid, t.updatetime,t.wlgs,t.ydbh,t.suretime
mapper.insert: insert into t_e_order(id, ordertype, ordermoney, createtime, paytime, invalidtime, status, wxid, addressid, itemid, updatetime) values(null,#{orderType},#{orderMoney},#{createTime},null,date_add(now(), interval 72 hour), '2',#{wxid},#{addressId},#{itemId},now())
mapper.update: update t_e_order set status='0' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ,r.reason, r.buyerstatus, r.sellerstatus from t_e_order t left join t_e_refund r on r.orderid=t.id where t.id = #{id} and t.status != '0'
